images.title: Grand Canal and Cappagh Overflow west of Clondalkin by jwd, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Grand Canal and Cappagh Overflow west of Clondalkin

description: This walk takes you along a pleasant section of the Grand Canal in the town of Sallins in County Kildare. The route takes you east along the canal to visit nearby Clondalkin. Here you can visit the lovely Corkagh Park where there's some fine footpaths, lakes and gardens. Along the walk you'll pass pretty locks, old bridges and enjoy some great views of the surrounding countryside. To continue your canal walking in the area head to neighbouring Naas where you can enjoy a stroll along the Naas Branch of the canal.
